discription: The 3 restaurants are perfect spots to grab a bite to eat, and you can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge or visit the sauna for a relaxing end to the day. An indoor pool, a fitness center, and a steam room are other highlights at this luxurious hotel. Fellow travelers say good things about the spacious guestrooms. The property is just a short walk to public transportation: Zaoying Station is 8 minutes and Agricultural Exhibition Center Station is 12 minutes.

You can visit the spa to be pampered with massages, facials, or hydrotherapy, and The Open Kitchen, one of 3 restaurants, serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other highlights at this luxurious hotel include 2 bars/lounges, an indoor pool, and a health club. The helpful staff and overall property condition get great marks from fellow travelers. The property is just a short walk to public transportation: Xingangdong Station is 4 minutes and Xingangdong Station is 7 minutes.

Guests can visit the spa to be pampered with massages, body wraps, or facials, and Cachet, one of 3 restaurants, serves international cuisine. An indoor pool, a bar/lounge, and a fitness center are other highlights at this luxurious hotel. Fellow travelers say good things about the helpful staff and overall property condition. The property is just a short walk to public transportation: South Huangpi Road Station is 4 minutes and Xintiandi Station is 7 minutes.
